name: Mini-Factory [BETA]
description:
Sit down, grab your controller and play a day at work in the mini-factory!

Your job is simple. Guide the items into their correctly coloured bins. I wouldn't let the easy sound of the job description fool you, things in the mini-factory get pretty hectic.

  • Currently REQUIRES an Xbox  controller to play

Feedback form: https://forms.gle/5cyCvQvPEufCYBvB8
